Text: K-Katagiri-san...
Oh, sorry. Did you wait long?\nSorry for calling you here...
It's fine. What's up?
Um...
I wanted to ask you something...
...Do you dislike girls who are rough around the edges?
No, I like them... Why?
Ｏｈ ｗａｉｔ, just a moment...
That's not the real reason I called you.
There's something I really want to tell you...
Ah...
I know I may not have seemed that way,\nsince I talk to everyone easily...
...but when I talk with you, I feel the most relaxed.
I only realized this recently.
The thought of graduating and not being able to see you anymore...
It made me really sad, and I didn't know what to do...
I'm a pretty easy-going person, but I've thought seriously\nabout this, and I've made up my mind.
It's really embarrassing for a girl to say this,\nbut I want you to hear my true feelings...
Just listen to them, that is enough.
Ｉ'ｌｌ ｍｉｓｓ ｙｏｕ.
I feel lonely without you...\nSo... So, please...
Didn't I say earlier that I like girls\nthat are rough around the edges?
Actually... I meant I like you, Katagiri-san.
Oh my goodness, I can't believe it! Really?
I wouldn't joke at a time like this.
Ah, ah... Ｕｎｂｅｌｉｅｖａｂｌｅ!! I can't believe it...
This is the happiest day of my life!\nＩ'ｌｌ ｎｅｖｅｒ ｆｏｒｇｅｔ!
I'll remember it as long as I live...!
A-Asahina san...
I don't know why I called you out here...
But there's something I want to say before graduation...\nHow can I say it?
Something you want to say...?
I used to love going to all the trendy places\nand follow fads, but...
I don't know how to explain it.\nLately, I've gotten tired of it.
I feel like, if I'm with someone I like,\nI'll have fun no matter where we go!
Like right now, being with you feels that way.
So you've gotten tired of it, huh?
You're such an idiot sometimes.\nI'm saying that being with you is fun for me!
W-What does that mean...?
It's embarrassing to say, but...
I think... I've fallen for you.
As long as I have you, I don't need anything else!\nI don't care about trends anymore.
So, please, go out with me.
Actually, I... I've liked you too, Asahina-san...
That's amazing, I'm so happy!
But still, isn't it more fun to go somewhere,\nrather than just being together all the time?
Y-Yeah, you're right.
Then, once we graduate, let's go on a trip somewhere!
Sure, sounds good.
Then let's head to the travel agency right now. Come on, hurry, hurry!
(Well, she hasn’t changed at all... but I guess that's okay.)
K-Kiyokawa-san...
Sorry for calling you out here.
It's fine, really. What's wrong?
Since we're graduating today, there’s something I really need to tell you.\nJust listening is enough...
Yeah... I'll listen.
Up until now, I've only focused on swimming,\nI never had time for love or romance...
...and the guys around me were all so weak,\nnone of them ever caught my interest.
So I never paid any attention to that stuff.
But lately, something changed, and I don't know when.
I started to think more and more about you...
I couldn't even focus on my training anymore.
Lately, I can’t even sleep at night...
...and my heart has been restless.
People have always told me that I look like a boy,\nbut that never bothered me.
But with you... I don't want you to see me that way.
That’s why I’ve tried not to speak roughly in front of you,\nand I’ve even watched how I act.
If none of that’s enough, then I’ll give up swimming.
I’ll grow my hair out as long as you want it!
S-Sorry...  know I’m saying all these selfish things...
But it’s okay if you reject me.
I just don’t want to graduate with these feelings bottled up.
I wanted you to hear how I feel...
Okay...
I love you.
So much I can't sleep at night.
I-I see, of course!!
Of course, someone like me isn’t good enough!
But at least I feel relieved having said it.\nThank you for listening.
K-Kiyokawa-san. Wait.
Don’t stop me. If you stop me, I’ll start hoping.
And if you say something just to comfort me,\nI’ll feel miserable...
Kiyokawa-san. I love you too.
W-what did you just say...?
I said, I love you, Kiyokawa-san.
R-Really? Even someone like me,\nwho's only good at swimming...?
Of course.
I-I can't... Now I can't stop crying...
Please...
Let me cry in your arms.
It's okay.
I’m so happy. This is the best feeling ever...
H-Himoo-san...
You kept me waiting.
N-no... sorry... for calling you out to a place like this.
What's wrong, Himoo-san? You're acting strange...
It's f-fine. I've decided to change, starting today.
Huh? Change?
Yes, change.
Until now, I've been looking down on others because of my own talent.
I've been a girl that anyone would find annoying.
I used to mock girls who cared about things like love and romance.
But at some point...
I started to feel something new, stirring inside me...
Then, I realized I had fallen for you.
But I’m a woman who sold her soul to the demon of science.
I wanted to suppress it.
I experimented with that.
But graduation kept coming...
And those feelings grew stronger,\nuntil I couldn't hold them back anymore.
That’s why I challenged you to a fight...
Because I wanted to completely deny those emotions.
The result... well, I don’t have to say it...
I lost to you in every possible way.
I don’t want to even think about you hating me anymore...
I’m abandoning my ambitions of world domination!
Because now, my only ambition is for you to like me...
To tell you the truth... I also like you, Himoo-san...
R-Really?
Then, my ambition has been fulfilled!
I'm so happy...
Even if I had taken over the world,\nI don’t think I could have been this happy...
I’m happy, too!
I'll try harder and harder... to become a girl you like even more.
S-shiori-san?
I'm sorry to call you out to a place like this.
There’s something I really need to tell you today...
What's wrong, Shiori?
I’ve... never dated a boy before...
But it’s not because I wasn’t interested.
I wanted to try dating, too. I’ve even gotten several love letters before!
But I just couldn’t bring myself to date anyone...
W-Why not?
Because of you...
Because you were always by my side...
Until now, I thought of you as just a childhood friend...
No, maybe I convinced myself of that...
Because I was scared of you realizing how I truly felt.
But now that we’re graduating...\nNow that we might go our separate ways...
I’ve finally come to realize these feelings.
It's embarrassing to say... and I want to run away...
...but I don't want us to just be childhood friends anymore.
I want you to see me as a girl, to see only me.
So I’m gathering my courage to tell you...
I love you.
More than anyone else in the entire world, I love you...
To tell the truth...\nI’ve also loved you, Shiori...
H-huh?
I’m so happy, but... I can’t stop crying!
I can really believe this, right? You really mean it?
Of course I do. I love you, Shiori.
I'm happy... I'm so happy...
Please, never let me go...
